message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer, but I'm looking to spend closer to $150.  Would you be willing to consider $160?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $170, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Alice, I understand you're firm on your price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Let's split the difference - I'll offer $165. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $165 and $170, so I'll offer it to you for $167.50. Is that a deal?
